mdx:
<TextFormatter

		{
			text: "{PUNTEO}",
			replacement: (
				<ComponentWithAuth withoutBlockContainer>
					<ImageWithLink
						src={DATA.song.assets.punteo}
						width={500}
						height={277}
					/>
				</ComponentWithAuth>
			),
		},
	]}
>
	{DATA.song.parsedLyrics}
</TextFormatter>
